content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the specific case number is provided but the parties involved are not mentioned the defendant has been ordered to pay court fees the court made a final decision on the division of matrimonial property with the applicant being given a motorcycle and the defendant being given a car the applicant filed a lawsuit seeking the dissolution of their marriage and requested certain assets to be declared as their personal property the court will decide on the division of joint property and the allocation of costs the court has decided to end the marriage and the applicant will keep their surname while the defendant will change back to their premarital name the court has awarded the applicant with a motorcycle and ordered the defendant to pay a fee to cover the costs of serving legal documents
